sections.title: Hiring the best to serve the best.

sections.mdMain:
At the end of the day, everything we do at DDS is to help save and improve lives for the warfighter and their families. We have the ability to make a difference in the most important way. Shifting culture at the DoD to better cultivate technical talent is a critical part of that, and that’s why we want you to join us for a “tour of duty.” 

At DDS, we know what can be done when we have technical people empowered to do what they do best. There are problems that exist today that can be solved right now with better technology and the right people. You are the right person, and DDS is the right SWAT team of nerds.
sections.mdCallout: **Interested in proving hoodies, hackers, and nerds have an important role to play in furthering national defense missions? We’ve built a team of top technical talent across the country to transform how the DoD builds and delivers digital services and products for DoD personnel.**
